org.tigris.gef.util
Class ColorUtility

java.lang.Object
  org.tigris.gef.util.ColorUtility

public class ColorUtility
extends java.lang.Object

A flyweight factory class used to get color instances. This only creates new instances of a Color if required. Previous instances are cached.

Since:
0.11.1 10-May-2005
Author:
Bob Tarling

Field Summary
private static java.util.Map USED_COLORS_BY_RGB_INTEGER
           
private static java.util.Map USED_COLORS_BY_RGB_STRING
          A map of previously created colors mapped by an RGB string description in the form "rrr ggg bbb" where rrr = red value int ggg = green value int and bbb = blue value int.

          A utility

Field Detail

USED_COLORS_BY_RGB_STRING

private static final java.util.Map USED_COLORS_BY_RGB_STRING
A map of previously created colors mapped by an RGB string description in the form "rrr ggg bbb" where rrr = red value int ggg = green value int and bbb = blue value int.

USED_COLORS_BY_RGB_INTEGER

private static final java.util.Map USED_COLORS_BY_RGB_INTEGER

A utility

Method Detail

getColor

public static java.awt.Color getColor(java.lang.String colorDescr,
                                      java.awt.Color defaultColor)
A flyweight factory method for reusing the same Color value multiple times.

Parameters:
colorDescr - A string of RGB values seperated by space or a color name recognised by PGML (later to include SVG)
defaultColor - a color to return if the color description can't be interpretted.
Returns:
the equivilent Color

getColor

A flyweight factory method for reusing the same Color value multiple times.

Parameters:
colorDescr - A string of RGB values seperated by space or a color name recognised by PGML (later to include SVG)
Returns:
the equivilent Color

getColorName

public static java.lang.String getColorName(java.awt.Color color)
Get a color name for a color or null if this is some custom color.

Parameters:
color -
Returns:
the color name or null.

getPgmlColor

public static java.lang.String getPgmlColor(java.awt.Color color)
Get the PGML description of a color. If possible this is a text description otherwise it is in red green blue integer format seperated by spaces.

Parameters:
color - The color to convert to PGML style
Returns:
a string representing the color in pgml format

getSvgColor

public static java.lang.String getSvgColor(java.awt.Color color)
Get the SVG description of a color. If possible this is a text description otherwise it is in hexadecimal red green blue format of either #rrggbb or #rgb.

Parameters:
color - The color to convert to SVG style
Returns:
a string representing the color in SVG format

colorToHex

private static java.lang.String colorToHex(int integer)
Convert an integer representing a color scale to 2 hex digits.

Parameters:
integer -
Returns:
A string of exactly 2 hexadecimal digits.

getColorByRgb

private static java.awt.Color getColorByRgb(java.lang.String colorDescr)
Get a color based on a space seperated RGB string.

Parameters:
colorDescr - an RGB description of the color as integers seperated by spaces.
Returns:
the required Color object.

getColorByRgb

private static java.awt.Color getColorByRgb(java.lang.Integer rgbInteger)
Get a color based on a single RGB integer.

Parameters:
rgbInteger - the integer value of the color.
Returns:
the required Color object.
